channel.title: CDH on Loving life and dreams.
channel.description: Recent content in CDH on Loving life and dreams.

item.title: Several pit records during CDH6 installation
item.description: In fact, CDH environment deployment and installation is not difficult, is the so-called mature can make a coincidence. But it just doesn’t happen that it’s been too long to operate, that is, there will be some “strange” problems, and then take some effort to solve the problem, and then record them down the road, to avoid recides later.
